review: I was not sure what to expect when I order Fire TV, but I thought i was going to be able to see single episode of some of my favorite sit coms. Only to discover that I have to purchase the hole season from the last season. I was hoping to watch last weeks or last months.Fire TV works well, but I don't think it is for me.  I was also hoping to have access to more internet movies that didn't cost and save on my cable service. Again I discovered that I have to upgrade my cable service to see the sports programs I want to watch.  So all that being said it just doesn't serve my needs or wants. It isn't what I expected.

I now find myself cursing the remote!!!That is the only negative i can find.Amazon selection of pay per view is great. author: Amazon Customer

review: I would like to highly recommend this device. You just plug it in and away you go. It has both inbuilt wireless and also an RJ45 Network socket. Getting onto the Internet takes, just a few seconds. Once you're connected, the device auto updates and then addresses you by your own name. Yes, your Amazon account is programmed in, so you can start watching/playing/listening straight away.  It is very easy to use with a single and very compact remote control. No instructions are needed at all, as you just follow the simple menus. The voice command recognition is simply excellent. I have not had a single misunderstanding and it has always found what I am after. The compact size is also a big plus. I've not measured it, but is seems to be about 4 inches square by an inch thick. It's just so good that I have every intention of getting a second box for the TV kids room. Fantastic product and highly recommended to all.
